g.text: Sequence Diagram / As a Project Manager, I want to know the number of active subscriptions or canceled subscriptions in a specific month
getDashboardView(int year,int month,boolean onlyActive,boolean onlyCancelled,String startDate,String endDate)
getTotalNewSubscriptionsByDate(int year,int month,boolean onlyActive,boolean onlyCancelled,String startDate,String endDate)
getTotalNewSubscriptions(int year,int month,boolean onlyActive,boolean onlyCancelled,String startDate,String endDate)
getTotalCancelledSubscriptions(int year,int month,boolean onlyActive,boolean onlyCancelled,String startDate,String endDate)
getTotalCancelledSubscriptionsByDate(int year,int month,boolean onlyActive,boolean onlyCancelled,String startDate,String endDate)
Dashboard obj = create(Integer active, Integer canceled)
